document_data.name: Lorthuun
document_data.mainbody: '''Lorthuun''' was a [[beholder]] member of the [[Zhentarim]] in [[Mantol-Derith]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Lorthuun joined the Zhentarim and was appointed to the crucial garrison of Mantol-Derith. At one point, it battled a [[behir]], which left it greatly injured and missing four of its eyestalks.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], it assisted [[Ghazrim DuLoc]] in keeping the situation in the trading post under control.
document_data.Relationships: Lorthuun had with Ghazrim DuLoc, the main delegate of the garrison, a relationship like that of a married couple, with them arguing and insulting each other often, but knowing both were loyal to the Black Network.
